prompt:
Best time to book JFK→CAI within next 60 days.
Include: fare ranges (USD), typical booking window (days before departure),
peak/holiday effects, basic bag policy differences, and 1–2 concrete examples.
Return STRICT JSON: {
  "origin": string, "destination": string, "window_days": number,
  "best_window_days": [min,max], "fare_low_usd": number, "fare_high_usd": number,
  "notes": string
}

message.content:
{
  "origin": "JFK",
  "destination": "CAI",
  "window_days": 30,
  "best_window_days": [21, 45],
  "fare_low_usd": 600,
  "fare_high_usd": 1200,
  "notes": "Booking 21 to 45 days in advance typically yields the best fares. Peak travel times, such as holidays (e.g., Christmas, New Year), can increase fares significantly. Basic economy fares usually include one personal item but may charge for carry-on and checked bags. For example, fares may drop to around $600 if booked 30 days out, while last-minute bookings can exceed $1200."
}
